description: Retrieves a summary of the account status report. To view the full report, download it from the Amazon S3 bucket where it was saved. Reports are accessible only when they have the complete status. Reports with other statuses ( running, cancelled, or error) are not available in the S3 bucket. For more information about downloading objects from an S3 bucket, see Downloading objects in the Amazon Simple Storage Service User Guide. For more information, see Generating the account status report for declarative policies in the Amazon Web Services Organizations User Guide.

nested_items.name: ReportId
nested_items.description: The ID of the report.

nested_items.name: S3Bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket where the report is located.

nested_items.name: S3Prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix for your S3 object.

nested_items.name: TargetId
nested_items.description: The root ID, organizational unit ID, or account ID.
For root: r-ab12
For OU: ou-ab12-cdef1234
For account: 123456789012

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time when the report generation started.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time when the report generation ended.

nested_items.name: NumberOfAccounts
nested_items.description: The total number of accounts associated with the specified targetId.

nested_items.name: NumberOfFailedAccounts
nested_items.description: The number of accounts where attributes could not be retrieved in any Region.

nested_items.name: AttributeSummaries
nested_items.description: The attributes described in the report.

nested_items.name: AttributeName
nested_items.description: The name of the attribute.

nested_items.name: MostFrequentValue
nested_items.description: The configuration value that is most frequently observed for the attribute.

nested_items.name: NumberOfMatchedAccounts
nested_items.description: The number of accounts with the same configuration value for the attribute that is most frequently observed.

nested_items.name: NumberOfUnmatchedAccounts
nested_items.description: The number of accounts with a configuration value different from the most frequently observed value for the attribute.

nested_items.name: RegionalSummaries
nested_items.description: The summary report for each Region for the attribute.

nested_items.name: RegionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: NumberOfMatchedAccounts
nested_items.description: The number of accounts in the Region with the same configuration value for the attribute that is most frequently observed.

nested_items.name: NumberOfUnmatchedAccounts
nested_items.description: The number of accounts in the Region with a configuration value different from the most frequently observed value for the attribute.
